query_text: Write a Python function named `find_longest_palindrome` that takes a string and returns the longest palindromic substring. The function should handle edge cases like empty strings and single characters. Language: Python. Function name: find_longest_palindrome
assertions:
assert find_longest_palindrome("babad") == "bab" or find_longest_palindrome("babad") == "aba"
assert find_longest_palindrome("cbbd") == "bb"
assert find_longest_palindrome("a") == "a"
assert find_longest_palindrome("ac") == "a" or find_longest_palindrome("ac") == "c"
assert find_longest_palindrome("") == ""
assert find_longest_palindrome("racecar") == "racecar"
assert find_longest_palindrome("noon") == "noon"
